name: Default
author: CloudArcade
changelog: Grid and vertial widget gamelist, RTL system, better navigation, multilevel dropdown menus, Open Graph, change archive.php to category.php, 4 footer section and improve some part of the theme design.
html:
After theme update, all of your Game List widget will not work, the widget is refactored in this update for better code and features, you need to re-implement the Game List widget.

Grid and Vertical layout Game List

Multilevel dropdown menus
